definition: a conflict arises close to home (idiom)

sentences.english: Russia has long wished to keep the West away from its backyard.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯长久以来都渴望让西方国家远离他的后院。

sentences.english: I parked the car in the backyard.
They (China) are mistakenly trying to impose a flawed Monroe Doctrine in their backyard.
sentences.chinese: 中国错误的想在自己的后院实施有缺陷的门罗主义。

sentences.english: Brand new wide sliding door leads you to the cozy back yard with pool and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 全新的大滑门带你到后院的舒适游泳池，还有果树。

sentences.english: At the time Xinhui and I were neighbours, living in adjacent yards.
sentences.chinese: 当时我和新辉是邻居，前后院住。

sentences.english: The ducks and geese puddled in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 鸭子和鹅在后院泥水中翻腾。

sentences.english: My neighbor and I built a fence between our backyards.
sentences.chinese: 我和邻居在后院建了个篱笆。

sentences.english: "The last thing Iran wants to see is a permanent American presence in its backyard," says Aslan.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗最不想看到的是美国在其后院永久的存在。

sentences.english: I can see straight into the neighbors' backyard frome here.
sentences.chinese: 从我这可直接看到邻居们家的后院。

sentences.english: Professional Front and Rear Landscaping with automatic sprinklers and drought resistant plants.
sentences.chinese: 专业的前后院设计有自动洒水器及耐旱植物。

sentences.english: Covered patio in backyard surrounded by block walls.
sentences.chinese: 在后院盖顶凉棚四周砖墙。

sentences.english: There are nine trees in Xiao Ming's backyard.
sentences.chinese: 小明家的后院有九棵树。

sentences.english: Deciding to do some back-yard landscaping, my father-in-law went to the brickyard to buy quantity of brick.
sentences.chinese: 我岳父打算买些砖来修整一下后院，他到砖厂拉砖。

sentences.english: In a deep dark lair, in Backyard USA, creep the Evil Black Bugs.
sentences.chinese: 在一个深暗的谎言后院美国，爬邪恶的黑错误。

sentences.english: Whowould want a warmonger that is always tries to invade other countries in his or her own back yard anyways?
sentences.chinese: 是谁总是在他国后院想方设法搞破坏呢？

definition: central building (in a traditional house)/primary wife
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
